ayah: ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ
ayah_translit: al-haqatu
ayah_english: The Inevitable Reality!

ayah: مَا ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ
ayah_translit: ma al-haqatu
ayah_english: What (is) the Inevitable Reality

ayah: مَا ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ
ayah_translit: ma al-haqatu
ayah_english: What (is) the Inevitable Reality

ayah: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ
ayah_translit: wama adraka ma al-haqatu
ayah_english: And what will make you know what (is) the Inevitable Reality

ayah: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ

ayah: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ وَعَادُۢ بِٱلۡقَارِعَةِ
ayah_translit: kadhabat thamudu wa'adun bil-qari'ati
ayah_english: Denied Thamud and Aad the Striking Calamity

ayah_translit: kadhabat thamudu wa'adun bil-qari'ati
ayah_english: Denied Thamud and Aad the Striking Calamity

ayah: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ
ayah_translit: fa-amma thamudu fa-uh'liku bil-taghiyati
ayah_english: So as for Thamud they were destroyed by the overpowering (blast)

ayah: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ

ayah: وَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِرِيحٖ صَرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٖ
ayah_translit: wa-amma adun fa-uh'liku birihin sarsarin atiyatin
ayah_english: And as for Aad they were destroyed by a wind screaming violent

ayah: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَبۡعَ لَيَالٖ وَثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومٗاۖ فَتَرَى ٱلۡقَوۡمَ فِيهَا صَرۡعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٍ خَاوِيَةٖ
ayah_translit: sakharaha alayhim sab'a layalin wathamaniyata ayyamin husuman fatara al-qawma fiha sar'a ka-annahum a'jazu nakhlin khawiyatin
ayah_english: Which He imposed upon them (for) seven nights and eight days (in) succession so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were trunks (of) date-palms hollow

ayah_translit: wajaa fir'awnu waman qablahu wal-mu'tafikatu bil-khati-ati
